title: FS: Price Drop T200 T207 Carey T206 Beckley T206 Evers Blue
author: 71buc

posts.post_title: FS: Price Drop T200 T207 Carey T206 Beckley T206 Evers Blue
posts.post_content:
I am trying to raise funds to purchase my holy grail.  These are some of my favorite cards but I am forced to make some hard choices.  I figured these would draw the most interest here.  I have never paid to have a card graded.   Payment by PayPal only, as I need the funds within the next 48 hours.  PM me if interested.


1912 T207 PSA 4 Max Carey Recruit back (SOLD)

1913 T200 Philadelphia Americans SGC 40 ($150.00)Sale Pending

1909-11 T206 - Jake Beckley ($150.00)No Longer Available

1909-11 T206 - Evers Cubs on shirt Blue ($150.00 Sale Pending)
T206s added to the list for sale

Thanks for the help I have sold almost $1000 in items to net54 members.  I'm less than $200 away from my target and have lowered the prices on these to get there with 24 hours left to go.  Once I reach my goal I will not sell the remaining cards.
